input_value.info: Object(s) to which Metadata should be added

text_in.info: Text input; value will be in 'text' attribute of Data object. Empty text entries are ignored.

metadata.info: Metadata to add to each object

data.info: List of Input objects each with added Metadata

dataframe.info: Data objects as a DataFrame, with metadata as columns

success.metadata_processed: Successfully processed metadata for {count} data objects

warnings.empty_metadata: No metadata provided. Objects will be processed without metadata changes.
warnings.no_input_data: No input data or text provided. Nothing to process.
warnings.empty_dataframe: No data available to create DataFrame

errors.invalid_object_type: Expected a Data object or a dictionary but got {obj_type}
errors.dict_conversion_failed: Failed to convert object to dictionary: {error}
